author: ralexstokes
content:
yes, we will have to extend all of the existing infra to support this "operation" class of object if we go the 4895 route

this EIP is a bit light on what it could contain as i mainly wanted to sketch out the idea and then circulate it to get feedback

4895 is "cleaner" but requires invasive changes

4863 mixes concerns a bit but only requires supporting a new 2718-style transaction type which is a much smaller ask

i expect to get broader feedback from client implementers on the next ACD (this friday) and if we get serious about 4895 then i can consider fleshing out more of that EIP
